name: PIV The Jeremy Piven Collection - Robusto 2021
additionalNotes: The Jeremy Piven collection, created by the famous actor and comedian Jeremy Piven, known for his role in the HBO television series "Entourage", offers an exclusive line of cigars produced in collaboration with Illusione. These cigars feature a fresh and distinctive blend of Nicaraguan cigars, reflecting Pivenâ€™s personal taste for quality and craftsmanship. The exclusive partnership between Illusione and Jeremy Piven guarantees a unique smoking experience, with medium to full strength cigars that stand out for their exceptional quality and flavor.
